title: Gemini can now pull context the rest of your Google apps, if you let it - Engadget
content:
Gemini can now pull context the rest of your Google apps, if you let it  Engadget
Gmail is entering the Gemini era  blog.google
Gemini AI is Headed for Your Gmail Inbox. Here's What's Changing  CNET
Google Gemini Can Proactively Analyze Users’ Gmail, Photos, Searches  Bloomberg.com
Gemini's new beta feature provides proactive responses based on your photos, emails, and more  TechCrunch
metaDescription: Gemini can now pull context the rest of your Google apps, if you let it - Engadget
